show_name: Dorami & Doraemons: Robot School's Seven Mysteries (movie)
other_title: ドラミ＆ドラえもんズ ロボット学校七不思議！？ (Japanese)
plot: Dorami is close to graduating from Robot School when in an instant almost every single student is captured by a mysterious entity. Even Doraemon and the principal are caught, leaving Dorami to ask for help of her brother's best friends, the Doraemons.
ending_theme: "Anata o Wasurenai" (あなたを忘れない) by Skirt
